a.detail: Several alcoves are cut into the walls here
a.summary: Several alcoves are cut into the walls here

c.detail: A tile labyrinth covers the floor
c.summary: A tile labyrinth covers the floor

i.detail: The walls here have been engraved with strange symbols
i.summary: The walls here have been engraved with strange symbols

m.detail: Burning torches in iron sconces line the corridor
m.summary: Burning torches in iron sconces line the corridor

n.detail: Skeletons hang from chains and manacles against the walls
n.summary: Skeletons hang from chains and manacles against the walls

r.detail:
Earthmaw Trap: DC 20 to find, DC 10 to disable;
    +8 to hit against one target, 2d10 piercing damage

s.detail: The sound of footsteps fills the corridor
s.summary: The sound of footsteps fills the corridor

details.history: The dungeon was created by dwarves as a tomb. It was eventually conquered by invaders, and has been conquered and altered many times since then.

monster: Hobgoblin (cr 1/2, mm 186) and 2 x Goblin (cr 1/4, mm 166); deadly, 200 xp

Treasure: 1600 cp, 1800 sp, 70 gp, azurite (10 gp), 2 x banded agate (10 gp), blue quartz (10 gp), 3 x lapis lazuli (10 gp), 2 x moss agate (10 gp), Folding Boat (rare, dmg 170), 2 x Potion of Diminution (rare, dmg 187), Potion of Invulnerability (rare, dmg 188)
detail.room_features: A stair ascends to a catwalk hanging between the north and south walls, and a pile of trash lies in the north-east corner of the room

south.desc: Stuck Strong Wooden Door (DC 15 to break; 20 hp)

west.desc: Secret (DC 25 to find) Trapped and Locked Good Wooden Door (DC 10 to open, DC 15 to break; 15 hp)
west.secret: The door is located several feet above the floor and concealed by an illusion
west.trap:
Guillotine Blade: DC 10 to find, DC 10 to disable;
    +7 to hit against one target, 2d10 slashing damage

monster: Hobgoblin (cr 1/2, mm 186) and 2 x Goblin (cr 1/4, mm 166); deadly, 200 xp
Hobgoblin (cr 1/2, mm 186) and 1 x Worg (cr 1/2, mm 341); deadly, 200 xp
detail.room_features: A stone dais and throne sits in the east side of the room, and a pile of torn paper lies in the east side of the room

monster: Hobgoblin (cr 1/2, mm 186) and 1 x Worg (cr 1/2, mm 341); deadly, 200 xp

Treasure: 2700 cp, 1600 sp, 50 gp, a bone chalice set with amethyst and chrysoberyl (25 gp), a rosewood figurine (of a male dwarf) adorned with chrysoprase (25 gp), an agateware salt cellar painted with woodland imagery (25 gp), an earthenware plate embossed with elven script (25 gp), an earthenware vase embossed with floral vines (25 gp)
detail.room_features: Rusting iron spikes line the walls, and a pile of broken arrows lies in the north side of the room

south.desc: Stuck Stone Door (DC 20 to break; 60 hp)

west.desc: Locked Stone Door (DC 15 to open, DC 25 to break; 60 hp)

detail.room_features: A magical statue in the north side of the room answers simple questions about the dungeon (points directions), and a tapestry of a legendary battle hangs from the east wall

east.desc: Secret (DC 25 to find) Trapped and Locked Good Wooden Door (DC 10 to open, DC 15 to break; 15 hp)
east.secret: The door is located several feet above the floor and concealed by an illusion
east.trap:
Guillotine Blade: DC 10 to find, DC 10 to disable;
    +7 to hit against one target, 2d10 slashing damage

east.desc: Stuck Simple Wooden Door (DC 10 to break; 10 hp)

south.desc: Trapped and Stuck Good Wooden Door (DC 15 to break; 15 hp)
south.trap:
Arrow Trap: DC 10 to find, DC 15 to disable;
    +12 to hit against one target, 4d10 piercing damage

west.desc: Locked Stone Door (DC 25 to open, DC 25 to break; 60 hp)
Locked Good Wooden Door (DC 20 to open, DC 15 to break; 15 hp)

detail.room_features: A ladder ascends to a wooden platform in the west side of the room, and a pile of rotten bread lies in the south-west corner of the room

east.desc: Stuck Iron Door (DC 25 to break; 60 hp)

south.desc: Stuck Stone Door (DC 20 to break; 60 hp)

wandering_monsters.1: Hobgoblin (cr 1/2, mm 186) and 2 x Goblin (cr 1/4, mm 166); deadly, 200 xp, actively patrolling their territory
wandering_monsters.2: Bugbear (cr 1, mm 33); hard, 200 xp, actively patrolling their territory
wandering_monsters.3: Orc Nurtured One of Yurtrus (cr 1/2, vgm 184) and 1 x Orc (cr 1/2, mm 246); deadly, 200 xp, wielding bizarre eldritch powers
wandering_monsters.4: Bugbear (cr 1, mm 33); hard, 200 xp, lost and desperate
wandering_monsters.5: Bugbear (cr 1, mm 33); hard, 200 xp, investigating a strange noise
wandering_monsters.6: Bugbear (cr 1, mm 33) and 1 x Goblin (cr 1/4, mm 166); hard, 250 xp, wandering senselessly
